bozic-konig.title: Božić König – Online Reservations
bozic-konig.description: React app for searching trips and buying tickets online.
bozic-konig.long: SPA in React/Next with optimized search, a clean checkout flow and back-office integration (routes, departures, pricing). Focus on UX and performance.

sti-web.title: Serbia Tours – Ticket Sales
sti-web.description: WordPress frontend with a Laravel API for departures, bookings and payments.
sti-web.long: Frontend is WordPress (custom theme/blocks) for speed and SEO. Laravel acts as the backend providing APIs for departures, pricing and bookings, with integrated payments and fiscalization. Redis caching and Nginx optimizations applied.

sti-mobile.title: Serbia Tours – Mobile app (iOS/Android)
sti-mobile.description: React Native app: search trips, accounts and reservations.
sti-mobile.long: Cross-platform app with Expo/React Native. Shared UI/logic, offline caching and push notifications.

drivesoft-backoffice.title: DriveSoft – Back-office (Laravel)
drivesoft-backoffice.description: Internal system for passengers, departures, routes and operations.
drivesoft-backoffice.long: Laravel app with complex models, RBAC, caching and queues. Reports and data import/export.

drivesoft-demo.title: DriveSoft – Demo reservations (React)
drivesoft-demo.description: Demo front-end for search & booking with static data.
drivesoft-demo.long: Clear UX with filters (direction, origin, destination, date, passengers). Demo version decoupled from production APIs; ready to hook to a real backend.
details: Easy to connect to real API

prostor-dereta.title: Prostor Miljenko Dereta – WordPress
prostor-dereta.description: Corporate WP site with blog and space-booking forms.
prostor-dereta.long: Modern WordPress build with custom templates and optimizations. Focus on speed, SEO and easy content editing.
